channel.title: Pff

item.title: Pff
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Normally I would have locked a topic like this just like Silabsoft did, but that ip matches a user here, did you download anything from this guy, or play on his server:

Anc13nts253

? I need to know so I can delete his downloads / ban him if need be.

edit:
Nevermind, Davidi2 already pmed him:

[quote=“Davidi2”]Did you happen to download this source before you got hacked
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,483567.new.html#new[/quote][quote=“X Entinity X”]Yeh I did… :. Stupid, I don’t even know why I downloaded it.[/quote]

Davidi2:

and did you have your rsbot details for that account in there? =/[/quote][quote=“X Entinity X”]yup :.

So I guess I’ll go ahead and permanently ban this guy for scamming on runescape. If you downloaded his stuff, you should change your password if it’s not too late.

item.description:

Oh wow, fucking pathetic, I got hacked again this time I lost over 30m. Here’s the IP that hacked me, do what the fuck you want with it. I’m quitting RS.
